data.title: Race against time for rescuers as hundreds feared dead in Mayotte
data.description: SAINT-DENIS DE LA REUNION - Rescuers raced against time Monday to reach survivors after a devastating cyclone ripped through the French Indian Ocean territory of Mayotte, destroying homes across the islands, with hundreds feared dead.

data.title: Man Utd deepen Guardiola's gloom, Chelsea gain on Liverpool
data.description: LONDON - Manchester United scored two late goals on Sunday to deepen the pain for beleaguered Manchester City boss Pep Guardiola as Chelsea moved just two points behind Premier League leaders Liverpool.

data.title: Top court rejects Surachate’s request to block dismissal order
data.description: The court ruled that his dismissal was lawful, rejecting the former deputy national police chief’s plea for an injunction

data.title: Diplomatic Ties Strengthened through Football in Thrilling Match
data.description: Bangkok, December 13, 2024 – Diplomacy met sportsmanship at Thephasadin Stadium as the embassies of Mongolia and the United Arab Emirates (UAE) teamed up with Thailand’s Tourist Police Bureau for a friendly football match. The event, held from 5:00 PM to 7:00 PM, was aimed at strengthening diplomatic ties and fostering goodwill through the universal language of sport.

data.title: Israel aims to 'double population' in annexed Golan: PM
data.description: JERUSALEM - The Israeli government approved on Sunday a plan to increase the population of the annexed Golan Heights, while insisting it had no intention of confronting Syria after seizing a UN-monitored buffer zone.

data.title: Black day? Guinness runs dry in UK pubs amid online craze
data.description: LONDON - At her London pub, landlady Kate Davidson has taken to issuing Guinness ration cards, but still the beer has run out amid a UK shortage of Ireland

data.title: End of the Dubai dream for Europe's drug lords?

data.title: 'Bali Nine' drug ring prisoners 'relieved' on return home
data.description: SYDNEY - The five remaining members of the Australian "Bali Nine" drug ring say they are "relieved and happy" over their return home after 19 years in jail in Indonesia.

data.title: Five years on from the pandemic, long Covid keeps lives on hold
data.description: VIENNA - Three years ago, Andrea Vanek was studying to be an arts and crafts teacher when spells of dizziness and heart palpitations suddenly started to make it impossible for her to even take short walks.

data.title: Police seize 483kg of ‘ice’, suspects arrested

data.title: Malaysia appoints Thaksin as informal advisor on Asean
data.description: Malaysian Prime Minister  Anwar Ibrahim  has appointed former premier  Thaksin Shinawatra  as an informal  advisor  when Malaysia takes up the chairmanship of the Association of Southeast Asian Nations next year.

data.title: Philippine Senate ratifies military access agreement with Japan
data.description: MANILA - The Philippine Senate on Monday ratified a reciprocal access agreement (RAA) with Japan that would allow their militaries to deploy on each other
